name: The Rise of American Fascism; A Tragicomedy in Three Acts
detailed_description:
"It may be different elsewhere. But democratic society - in it, the highest duty of the writer, the composer, the artist is to remain true to himself and to let the chips fall where they may." - John F. Kennedy, President of the United States, to Amherst College upon receiving an Honorary Degree, 1963

"I don't believe there is a game." - John Walker, Senior Editor of Rock, Paper, Shotgun, to my inbox, 2018



You know when you've got that "I just punched a Nazi in the face" afterglow but you've still got the urge to laugh at how moronic fascists are? $12.99 is the price. Even if you've never seen a Nazi (yet), The Rise of American Fascism; Act One, is a fun opportunity to observe how difficult it is to be a bigot all day and all night- the absurd logic, the hate crimes, the message board posts.

No child is born wanting to shoot feminists in Red Dead Redemption 2. You play as Steve Bannon (the 2016 'oh no this man has power' version not the 2019 'oh no this man won't shower' version). As the Calamity Bannondorf, travel through time and space and Oshkosh, Wisconsin being the unseen puppetmaster; convincing the angry young men of Reddit to post on your uncles Facebook about how Hillary Clinton is pimping kidnapped children out of a Washington DC pizzeria, convincing the rich to donate money to stop two dudes from getting married, and convincing the people of Wisconsin that Oshkosh is God's vision of Heaven on Earth.

Learn the lore, enjoy the fast paced JRPG battle system, and of course: laugh at how difficult it is to be a moron every waking moment of your life as you try to protect the "culture and history" of America. Ever seen billionaire globalist George Soros take on his eight legged spider form? If you buy this game, I promise you will. The deepest lore (NieR) is presented through in game cutscenes, short prose stories, minigames, narrated live action shorts, and other mysteries.

Y'all wanna JRPG across America? The battle system encourages you to (unlike an actual American Fascist) think several steps ahead, AND! with the quick reload system you get as many tries as there are genders! (Infinite) And what would a game in 2019 be without a minigame that can later be spun off to a mobile title: YES, THIS GAME HAS A BATTLE ROYALE MODE. START MAKING THE YOUTUBE VIDEOS NINJA

There is no escapism from fascism. That's what they want. They want you distracted with Wii U screenshots while they build camps at the border to put children into. You can let it frighten you, as many do. Or you can let your anger empower you. We pave the sunlit path toward justice together, brick by brick. This is my brick, only I'm not putting it in the road. I'm putting it on Steam and charging $12.99 for it.


GAME FEATURES
-A Fast Paced JRPG-Inspired Battle System
-Original, Award Winning Soundtrack That Many People Are Saying is 'Better Than Undertale'
-Several Minutes of Professionally Recorded Voice Acting
-Lore Deeper Than the Pockets of Billionaire Globalist George Soros
-Beautiful Full HD 720p

  • The Rise of American Fascism; A Tragicomedy in Three Acts; Act One
  • Digital DRM Free Album, "Laughing & Screaming 'Songs From and Inspired by the Game 'The Rise of American Fascism, Act On', Featuring the Hit Singles 'One ½ Winged Angel' & 'America (The Theme Song)'
  • 2 Exclusive Wallpapers
